name: The Power of Barking
description:
You are a LITTLE dog, and the world is very BIG. Every day, STRANGERS come within 1000 ft of your home and you bark at them until they leave. If you do not, they could murder your entire family. You must be vigilant! 

Made for TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam 2021

Credits:
Pixel Dogs by Benvictus
Living Room by Dairanium
Kenney Game Assets by Kenney
1980 by Void 
Concept and voice work by Jellybean
